alert.note: Alert for Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 31 at 3:43PM AKST until January 03 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Skagway, Klondike Highway and Downtown Juneau. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Recent snows combined with blustery winds could further hamper travel with reduced visibility in blowing snow. Wind chills may also be of concern, particularly along the Klondike Highway.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway
